entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
